author: MaximoTrinidad
body:
# Summary of the new feature/enhancement

Just an observation, the Azure Cloud Shell, PowerShell needs to be upgraded to the latest version PowerShell 7 GA.

Or, is there a way to do the update my self? 

:)

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
Thgis was announced in https://devblogs.microsoft.com/powershell/announcing-powershell-7-0/
PowerShell
Announcing PowerShell 7.0 | PowerShell
Today, we’re happy to announce the Generally Available (GA) release of PowerShell 7.0! Before anything else, we’d like to thank our many, many open-source contributors for making this release possible by submitting code, tests, documentation, and issue feedback. PowerShell 7 would not have been possible without your help.

comments.author: MaximoTrinidad
comments.body:
@iSazonov 

I read about it: "Azure Cloud Shell has already been updated to use PowerShell 7,"
But, I'm still getting PowerShell 7 RC 2.

![AZPOSH_2020-03-05_14-13-17](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19892435/76016860-98141580-5eeb-11ea-8f04-d7487892cc14.jpg)

title: Update Azure Cloud Shell to have PowerShell 7 GA.
